mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sponsor (user_id, spon_number ,spon_date, spon_huwon, spon_money, spon_pay, spon_open, spon_content) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{spon_number}, #{spon_date}, #{spon_huwon}, #{spon_money}, #{spon_pay}, #{spon_open}, #{spon_content})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, SUM(spon_money) AS spon_money, (SELECT spon_content FROM sponsor WHERE user_id = A.user_id ORDER BY spon_date DESC LIMIT 1) AS spon_content, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sponsor WHERE user_id = A.user_id AND spon_open = '공개') THEN '공개' ELSE '비공개' END AS spon_open FROM sponsor A GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY spon_money DESC;
SELECT spon_no FROM sponsor ORDER BY spon_no DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT SUM(spon_money) AS spon_sum FROM sponsor WHERE user_id = #{user_id};
